Articles.Content:
It's a free-to-play 3rd person shooter, with what seems to be some nice progression (not too much p2w) and great visuals, especially for a f2p game.

I need some steam buddies to play it with since it's very much co-op and so far the pickup groups have been less than stellar

So, any takers?
That game has a realy nice aestetics to it but i havent gotten arount to playing it,has some wacky concepts as well.
Yup, I haven't quite decided whether or not I like it, but it's definitely good enough to give it a whirl
I've played it but I just don't like certain aspects about it. Its a fun little shoot em up style FPS but nothing more in my opinion.
